text:
I was totes NOT expecting to get
a note so soon after I moved in!
Thanks! Oh, and double thanks for
the prezzie! I CANNOT wait to start
life here. As a way of saying "hey,"
I attached something to this!

Thanks for the note AND the gift!
I got you a thing too! (Neat, right?)
I hauled it here from my old place,
so you can call it "imported" if you
want to be fancy. I hope you like it!

Thank you soooo much for the
message AND the prezzie! You
really helped me feel good about
moving here! I got you a little
something too. See you around!

I was totes not expecting to get
FAN MAIL this soon after moving
here! I'm so glad I moved to an
island where folks know what's
cool! Feel free to keep the
letters coming!

I was so HAPPY to see I got a
message so soon after moving in!
To be honest, I was feeling a bit
lonely being new to the island. It's
great to make a friend so soon.

Thank you SO much for your note!
As official island pop star, I have to
make sure I do my absolute best
to bring smiles to all the folks!
So thanks for bringing a smile
to me!
